subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The 2009 French Grand Prix was canceled as the financially troubled French Motorsport Federation withdrew its backing for the Formula One race. The federation’s board said it did not want to risk a financial loss by holding the race next year, but it would try to resurrect the race, the oldest grand prix, in 2010.
